Continuation: Haruhiko arrives at the crime scene, he goes into despair for his friends, crying he kneels on the floor and everything goes dark.
In the void a light appears and covers him, then Haruhiko wakes up in the fading mist, with Mai, Reina, Minase, and Kurumi calling him, all doing well. So he understands, it turns out that it was him who was dreaming all this time. He laughs, gets up, walks over to them, and Happy Ending.
